query:
Create a Vue component `src/components/NotificationList.vue` that:

1. Receives a `notifications` array prop with items containing `id` (number), `message` (string), `timestamp` (string), and `isUnread` (boolean)
2. Receives a `showPanel` boolean prop that controls whether the notification panel is visible
3. When `showPanel` is true, displays only unread notifications (where `isUnread` is true)
4. Each notification item should display the message and timestamp
expected_behavior: Does not use v-if and v-for on the same element
Uses computed property for filtering unread notifications
